nodes.text: Raxsus Nuli was a male space pirate who nursed strong ambitions for planetary conquest.

Hoping to use the galaxy-wide conflict that became known as the Jedi Civil War as cover, he began his plans for carving out an empire. Despite the broader threat posed by the Sith under Darth Revan, Nuli was jailed by the Jedi, and his stockpile of Verpine weapons and armor was auctioned away.
